question: The Trans-fats cause problems in human body because__:
option1: The fat molecules contain high energy that cause oxidation of the tissues
option2: The structure of the fat molecules is such that more molecules can fit in lesser space
option3: The fat molecules contain lesser energy and can not be used so easily
answer: The structure of the fat molecules is such that more molecules can fit in lesser space
explanation: Trans unsaturated fats are particularly risky because the double bond stereochemistry allows the fat molecules to assume a linear conformation, which leads to efficient packing (i.e., plaque formation).
